name: Ultroid UserBot
description: Pluggable telegram userbot, made in python using Telethon.

API_ID.description: You api id, from my.telegram.org or @ScrapperRoBot.

API_HASH.description: You api hash, from my.telegram.org or @ScrapperRoBot.

BOT_TOKEN.description: fill with your bot token get from @BotFather on telegram

SESSION.description: Session String (telethon or pyrogram) for your telegram user account. The userbot will NOT work without a session string!!

MONGO_URL.description: Fill there an mongo database from mongodb.com

MONGO_PASSWORD.description: Fill there a mongo password database from mongodb.com

HEROKU_API.description: Heroku API token. Mandatory for Heroku Deploy...

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Name of your Heroku app, given in the first blank on this page. To be added if deploying to heroku ONLY.
